ygData.subject: RE: Do you have to be a gnome to do tinkering??
ygData.msgSnippet: Well Every Char & Race has a Base of 50 Tinkering. We will fail More than the Gnomes on Trivial Items, but we can still tinker basic stuff.  The only Draw back
ygData.messageBody:
Well Every Char & Race has a Base of 50 Tinkering. We will fail More than
the Gnomes on Trivial Items, but we can still tinker basic stuff. The only
Draw back is our Skill WILL NEVER INCREASE, since Gnomes MUST train in this
at their Guild to activate the skill. I made a Collapsible Fishing poll
yesterday with my 34th level Halfling Druid :). Well Good Luck

-----Original Message-----
From: ms277017@... [mailto:ms277017@...]
Sent: Monday, October 25, 1999 6:39 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Do you have to be a gnome to do tinkering??

From: ms277017@...

I want to tinker but im a dark elf :(... and gnomes cant be shadowknights so
I dunno =(

One worried dark elf..
